recommended_degree: Ilmu Komputer, Rekayasa Perangkat Lunak, Sistem Informasi (Sarjana)
job_description:
Job Description:
- Assist in developing and maintaining web applications, servers, databases, and web scraping scripts.
- Support the design and optimization of web scraping pipelines to collect and process data efficiently.
- Collaborate with the engineering team to build and improve full-stack applications.
- Help maintain and enhance existing web scraping projects.
- Learn to develop scalable and reliable data extraction solutions.
- Assist in integrating APIs and improving overall system performance.
- Troubleshoot and debug technical issues under the guidance of senior engineers.

Requirements:
-  Fresh graduate majoring in Software Engineering (RPL), Computer Science, or related fields.
- Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
- Familiarity with backend development using Node.js.
- Understanding of relational databases such as MySQL or PostgreSQL.
- Interest in web scraping techniques and data processing.
- Eager to learn and contribute to real projects in a collaborative team environment.
- Good communication skills and willingness to take feedback constructively
- Willing to work hybrid 3 day WFO in Bandung 
-  Placement for MrScraper
